entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
